scripts.generate-version: printf "// This file is auto-generated during build\nexport const PACKAGE_VERSION = \"%s\";\n" "$npm_package_version" > src/version.ts
scripts.build: BROWSERSLIST_ENV=modern microbundle --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment --jsxImportSource react src/index.ts --no-external @elevenlabs/client
scripts.dev: pnpm run clean && pnpm run generate-version && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=development microbundle --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment --jsxImportSource react src/index.ts -w -f modern --no-external @elevenlabs/client
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:ts && pnpm run lint:es && pnpm run lint:prettier
